website_summaries.verdict: A quality choice for anyone from kids in house league all the way up to dedicated adult players.
pros: We love the thick padding on these gloves, thick enough to eliminate any stinging feeling from saving a ball, but still flexible
This glove also has an extra-sticky grip, making saves just that much easier
cons: The finger save, while helpful, is too stiff
There is some discomfort when trying to make a fist

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gloves for the price!!! I was skeptical about buying something that’s not a very known brand but these are just fine. Managed to save a few goals with them in my pick up game :)
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying this is a great deal, considering it not only includes the gloves but also the wrist bands. They're cheap looking but after wearing them they definitely do not feel the same way. They grip is great, they're large enough to fit my big hands and the provide finger protection with pieces of wire or plastic in each finger, which makes me feel safer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Gomez

customer_reviews.title: but because its made of great quality and he loved it- I ordered size 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: originally I ordered too small size 8 for my 12 year old boy, but because its made of great quality and he loved it- I ordered size 10 and its perfect I wish I had spring for bigger once to begin with, its made tighter around wrist to hold it better. and then you have Velcro around to make it as tight as comfy as you want. he played 1st game in the rain - they got grassy and dirty- cleaned up with paper towel and water- holds up very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product (Amazing price) must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to start off by saying I'm not a true keeper. I got thrown in to it, I play indoor soccer so the balls come fast and very hard. I found out the hard way how important it is to have some good gloves. These glove are amazing for the price. The padding on them is great they feel stiff around the fingers (well protected) they are great gloves. I definitely recommend them. They also added elbow/knee gourd for free.
customer_reviews.author: jovany

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with solid product...
customer_reviews.text: Goalie husband very happy with his new gear... First game went well also so he was happy safe and comfortable. This is important since my husband as an adult has broken a wrist, blown his collar, rip his foot, cracked ribs, etc... My husband is very competitive he likes tight gloves so he can grip and feel the ball. He really liked the extra sleeves because goalies are jumping diving charging if you play the game you are not just in the box so lots of sudden burst. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Daniel De' foe

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e been playing goalie for 10years. The grip is amazing and they last, the finger protection keeps your fingers in the right place nice and strong which allows a super strong grip on the ball. They fit perfectly on my hand and they don't move because of the double wrist band. Super super glove, I definitely will buy them again. These glove definitely are better than some of the big brands like reusch, uhlsport, nike, and adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for the money spent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the youth soccer girls team I help coach so anyone who want to try goalie will have some hand protection. They seem reasonably durable and have a nice sticky palm area to hold on to the ball well and have decent padding. The size 7 seems to fit everyone reasonably well also. They are all 10-11 year old girls with slightly varied hand sizes. Honestly for the price these are an easy gamble, and worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Insert name here.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Based on the good reviews I bought these for my daughter to take to her high school soccer camp. She never even taken them out of the package when she packed them for camp. Four days later she came home with the gloves completely worn out. She said that the threads begin to come loose after a couple of days. And the foam stuff on the front started coming off in pieces. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: khicks

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing goalie for 18 years and have always used nike, or adidas gloves. These gloves are extremely comparable to all of those gloves! I really like them. The grip is amazing. The reason for 4 stars and not 5 would be that the wrist portion is a little thin (I am used to a thicker band), and doesn't have as much support as all the other gloves I have used, but I would 100% buy these again, and probably will once these get worn out. It is so great to have an affordable, quality, glove option!
customer_reviews.author: Salty Lakes

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews bad and good and had to try these. The price was just that good.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, for the money you WILL NOT beat these gloves. I did find the "Uncomfortable finger support" issue with one finger but this is easily managed with a bit of wiggling. It seems like it might be a bit lose and gets on its edge. I played for nearly three hours on a 95 F day with high humidity. The gloves weren't overly hot and felt good the entire time. Grip is good Cushion is good to very good comfort is (after adjusting the finger support) very good. The wrist and elbow sleeves might be handy if you play on turf but they don't offer much. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Tried to strike a balance between price and quality/longevity. Not a bad price for my son's first pair in U09/U10 soccer. Gloves show a bit of wear after a few practices and a game. The tack has already gone down a bit, but will probably order some conditioner. I have 5 boys playing keeper on my team, and this is one of the few pairs that hasn't had physical damage to the catching surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, affordable gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son - other players on his tea - and some players on my daughter's team, too, are really liking these gloves! I can't vouch for how long they'll last, but at this price, even if they only last most of a season, I'll be happy. They have kind of a snug fit compared to the last size 7 gloves we had - but everyone says they fit and work well. And, the extras included with the gloves are pretty cool, too. No complaints from us so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Tendon injury and avulsion fracture!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a soccer goalie and bought these gloves to use during practice. While blocking a shot the ball hit the end of his finger resulting in a partial tendon tear and avulsion fracture. The finger spines are supposed to prevent this from happening! He is now out for the season as goalie and may be looking at surgery to repair his finger. Do not depend on these gloves to protect your hands!
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap glove. don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 15 yr old daughter. She wore them 2 times at catching training and on the 3rd time wearing them they did some diving drills and they got totally tore up. Might be able to get one more session out of them. I would suggest spending a little more money on a pair of glove that will last. I would not buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Rodolph

customer_reviews.title: These gloves have a ton of padding
customer_reviews.text: I am comparing them to my old pair, which seem much less padded. Mind you, this could be because they are my old pair, but these have great padding. It does seem like these ones have a little more "play" in the fingers, but not by much (they allow my fingers to bend back a little more easily. The coloring seems fine, and for this price - it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfortable keeper gloves
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfortable keeper gloves. I am a part time goalie, and I had a thumb sprain a month ago. It gives a clear protection to the tip of the fingers. Very easy to use, and adjust the size. Size: 9
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Parajuli

customer_reviews.title: can palm a regulation size soccer ball ▫finger protection not too restrictive ▫durabillity is ok but not the best Cons: ▫Non removable fingersaves ▫Like i said durabillity ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves three weeks ago and im practicing twice a week with intense training. After the first practice i had one scratch on the palm and one on the backhand. Pros: ▫Sticky latex, can palm a regulation size soccer ball ▫finger protection not too restrictive ▫durabillity is ok but not the best Cons: ▫Non removable fingersaves ▫Like i said durabillity not the best So overall great gloves it would benifit having a nice giga grip latex for a perfect training glove but still will recomend and will buy again loved the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Michka Guerrier

customer_reviews.title: Great Finger Splines
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my 9 year old because of the finger splines time protect his hands. He had previously caught a soccer ball that was kicked at him by the coaches son and got a small fracture in his wrist. Besides the splines, my son fell in love with the gloves. The fit is good. He says they look better in person than online and remind him of Star Wars. The gloves also provide a good grip on the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Architect

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and item as described. Sizing is dead on.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart is accurate, at least for me. Item arrived on time for my first game so I am very excited. I have not tested in a match yet, but I can already tell the quality is quite durable and is comfortable to wear. The protection around the fingers is also noticeable. Definitely will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Malec Sandakli

customer_reviews.title: The only gloves we buy now
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays goalie for her school and on a travel team. We have gone through many different brands of goalie gloves through the years until we found this one. In fact, this is the second pair we have bought. The first pair lasted us 2 seasons! For those of you that have purchased goalie gloves before, you know that this is unheard of. Typically, gloves start to rip and tear within the first couple of months. Not these... they lasted through practices 3 times a week, games, tournaments, mud, water... you name it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased/worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very please with these gloves, especially for the price. These gloves seem more durable than our previous ones with more wrist support, and ventilation (pictured) as well. It has also been uncreasingly harder to find goalie/keeper gloves with the added boning in the fingers so, I am definitely pleased that these have it. Fit is exactly as expected. Will definitely be purchasing these again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: r&cs87

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with Finger Saves
customer_reviews.text: Low cost gloves with finger saves did not work for me. As a goalkeeper in 3 leagues, I need the finger saves to work. In my first attempt to block a hard shot, the finger saves were ineffective. I was con earned my first ger was going to be strained or broken. Luck was on my side. Now to but something else. I should have stuck with Reusch as they always performed well in the past.
customer_reviews.author: James K Sparks Jr

customer_reviews.title: ... soccer team this season and they seemed to work fine. I’d say they are probably the right size ...
customer_reviews.text: These were used by goalies for my U9/10 soccer team this season and they seemed to work fine. I’d say they are probably the right size for 8-11 year olds. I had a large near 10-year old using them some, but much larger you may need a larger pair.
customer_reviews.author: lowly developer

customer_reviews.title: ... to the high quality Puma gloves that I still love to this day
customer_reviews.text: Im used to the high quality Puma gloves that I still love to this day..So this is my personal opinion on these.. Very good quality,comfy for the price . The palms are thick,pretty good quality..Finger spines are comfortable, but the backhand is a little thin,I may be worried if I punch a blazing shot, it I may feel it..Still haven't tried them out yet. So we will see what happens I tried them out a in an indoor game...
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these gloves over my $60+ pairs. Main difference is they appear to have less padding on the back then more expensive models. Grip is excellent. The wrist strap is kind of weak. Every pair I've ever had gets torn up after a few games. So for me this price point is excellent since I consider these disposable. Fit is also perfect for me. I have shorter fingers than some ppl so i'll list my specs. This might be why some ppl may need to round up. Bought size 9. My hand: Circumference 21.5 cm Length from bottom palm to end of middle finger 19 cm
customer_reviews.author: LogisticsMan

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my 12 yr old daughter who plays in a rec league. She used these gloves for a spring and fall session, 12 games total. She typically plays one half of each game as keeper. The gloves held up well for the spring session but started showing extreme signs of wear at the beginning of the fall session with one the finger guards breaking in the second game. The Velcro also started to fail and the outer layer of the gloves started pealing as well. They served their purpose but for her next pair I'll pay more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE PASZTOR

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel sticky and absorbs sweat effectively!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the color combination of this product. Black, white and red my favorite. It is very durable and feels good from a comfort standpoint. Slightly tighter around the wrist area (maybe I needed a size bigger) which makes it slightly difficult to fold the palm. The velcro to tighten/loosen it fixes the issue to a great extent. But overall, it is made of quality material and gives a good grip on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sabharish Nandan Kathiresan

customer_reviews.title: The gloves may run a bit small, easy to clean and have a nice grip.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves seem to be working well this season. We purchased size 7 for my 14 year old daughter and they were a bit tighter than the more expensive brands we have tried, so they may run a bit smaller. She hasn't mentioned the fit since she first tried them on so maybe they have stretched a little. Dirt wipes off with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Dscott3076

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginner Glove, spines and webbing weak
customer_reviews.text: Very good glove for the money. These gloves have served my daughter well as a beginner but, for intermediate play they wear fast and not all their gloves are of consistent quality. I suggest checking the webbing between the fingers and spines after initial use, they often break away.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 yr old son. He loves them & said they are his favorite pair of keeper gloves that he has ever had. He said the fingertips feel like they have a spring in them that prevents his fingers from bending backwards & his fingers don't hurt after games.
customer_reviews.author: C Schuller

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these gloves was not what we expected. I had to replace them for my son within a month. the stitching came apart at the seams in many areas.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Very solid entry level keeper gloves
customer_reviews.text: For $30 gloves, I was satisfied. I used them for 6 months playing indoor soccer 2 days a week. As you can see from the picture, they wore out pretty fast from the astroturf, and I had to replace them with a new pair. Very good gloves for the low price. The free arm band and wrist guard was a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: He is the high school varsity goalkeeper and says they work great. The only issue we had is that they ...
customer_reviews.text: My son who is in 8th grade wears these. He is the high school varsity goalkeeper and says they work great. The only issue we had is that they are sized a little small . We had to reorder and get the next size up. Still waiting on the return documentation for returning the first pair. But as far as product they are great .
customer_reviews.author: Ric K

customer_reviews.title: COVID-19 took away this seasons use.  But kids liked and felt good.
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on the durability as the season was canceled due to COVID-19. But the 2 games we used them they worked great. Did not stay clean, but the finger protection and grasp is very good. Will update after next season. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: very padded, very durable
customer_reviews.text: gloves work excellent, no reason to ever purchase a more expensive pair IMO, as these are very good. i was under the impression these would instantly make my team's keeper better, but even with these gloves hes still not good, can't blame it on the gloves tho.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Mahon

customer_reviews.title: We will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are for my eight-year-old son. He loves them! He has been using these for several weeks during practice and in games. The gloves are very durable, easy to clean and protect his fingers from bending to far back. We will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: P. C.

customer_reviews.title: Goalkeeper Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very durable and comfortable. After three weeks it looks like this. My son love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I do not concern myself with the overall product price. I concerned myself with the price point of an item and expected life cycle. Is this the best product on the market, no. Is it the worst, no. But for the every day user compared to price, best. Wil buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GRat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap enough for training while keeping finger protection
customer_reviews.text: Although the price differential versus match-focused gloves is smaller than it used to be, these still present a good price/value equation which makes them ideal for training sessions. They provide increased finger protection and good durability without having to pay for the fancy/thick latex in gloves meant for matches.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality but ok for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: They are ok for the money paid but the quality of the material is poor , the second time I used them the wrist straps came off I still use them but they almost worn out I have them for a month I have used them for about 15 times, For kids should ok but I do not recommend them for adults.
customer_reviews.author: ivan v.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great for cheap gloves. If you bend your fingers back spines may jam you in the knuckles. Super comfortable and fit well. I do wish it had more wrist support. I play against college soccer players and stopping their shots makes my wrist sting lol. Customer service was great. Good people!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic Mini

customer_reviews.title: Great value set of gloves
customer_reviews.text: For less than $30 you're not going to find a better pair of gloves! These fit and feel great! They're not as durable as a pair that costs over $100, but they are so much better than any "cheap" pair from a box store. The finger saves are a nice feature that you won't find from the big brands at a price that is anywhere close to this. If you want to test the waters of being a goalie or want a good but inexpensive pair of gloves for practice, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, durable.
customer_reviews.text: They work well, I have twin daughter's that both play goal, they play travel and with 3 practices a week, and 60 in a 10 month span, they do well. We go through a pair a season, but they are good gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These are truly top quality gloves. My son loves them and he swears by them to his teammates. They get slot of attention from his teammates and coach alike.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Pageot

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money; worst quality
customer_reviews.text: The gloves ripped from the first match. They began ripping at the seams of the fingers then the latex began ripping all over the glove.See attached photos. This is too bad, rip off and worst quality ever. Amazon should not allow this to happen; very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: iajarmeh

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a season
customer_reviews.text: Overall an "okay" glove. The underside grip started to wear a few weeks into the season and lost its stickiness. The gloves still made it through the season and will be a good practice pair moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grip and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 10 for back up gloves for an adult recreational soccer team, so they don't get used all that often but they fit several people. These gloves have a great grip, fit comfortably, and work well. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Tania Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually very picky on my gloves. These are awesome gloves for the price. Very durable and work very well. I've used them three times already and love the way the work for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: JFroggin11

customer_reviews.title: Initially right after we received it it seemed like really decent pair of gloves and the arm and ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially right after we received it it seemed like really decent pair of gloves and the arm and wrist brace were definitely nice addition. But after only three use the wrist band on the right glove came off. The stitching quality is sub par and the material is also low grade. I have hand stitched it back on and also added glue. For now that works but makes the wrist strap kind of rigid. I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are okay. The protection on the fingers is nice and the wrist wrap portion is tight when needed. Only issue is, after one game a huge chunk came out of the palm. I was playing indoor soccer so not sure if the turf caused that or not.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Sore on the knuckles.
customer_reviews.text: Whatever is in the top of the gloves makes these gloves very uncomfortable to make a fist in. I bought these for the team that I coach and both keepers said they wouldn't wear them again because of the sores they created on their knuckles. They have great grip though, so if you can play without making a fist they could work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: These took a little work getting them on but once they were they were a good fit. Handling the ball was much easier on my fingers and hands. I’m pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tony W

customer_reviews.title: Sizing info
customer_reviews.text: I would not go by the chart on the listing and rather use more typical sizing charts or order your usual size. My son is a 10 and based on the chart I ordered a 9 and it was too small
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lombardozzi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my U10 soccer team!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for most of my 9 year olds. Seem to be of good quality and support for the wrist and fingers. Should keep their hands well suited for our tournaments!
customer_reviews.author: refchick247

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Considering the cost of this product and the included wrist bands I would say it's a good deal! The gloves feel comfortable and there is enough padding to prevent the ball from stinging my hands. They seem to be holding up well so far so I'm sure I'll get my money's worth. Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Char- Char

customer_reviews.title: Ran 1 size big but great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a size 6 for my 8-year-old son. It was a size too big so I immediately sent it back and purchased the size 5. Took off one star for the size issue. I'm so glad I purchased these goalie gloves though, and my son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Ep

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son really likes these. They were great for the price and they fit well. He's an aggressive keeper and has had no problems with these.
customer_reviews.author: ALY

customer_reviews.title: Great budget set of gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I play in an adult recreational league. Just started goalkeeping. These gloves feel really good on my hands. I usually don't like wearing for work or working out but I actually enjoyed having these on. I finally got to practice with them last night. Good grip. Only bummer was that the grip started to wear after one practice.Still great entry level gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica & Bert

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, which isn't much
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap goalie gloves. They disintegrate quickly, especially if you are playing on an artificial field. They worked well for intramural/pickup soccer, but I would definitely not recommend them for a real soccer player.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good and accurate. The only thing I wished was that it explained the additional pieces that are in the package. It came with two small black bands, and two longer, bands. We figured it out, but since my son's arms are so small, the elbow bands weren't as obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are for my son. He said they are comfortable. There's some high priced keeper gloves out there and I would say these are just as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: okc

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying goalie gloves for my daughter online. She is pretty picky about her gloves, and even though I measured her at the store I was nervous buying online. They fit perfectly! She was excited and it was exactly the fit she likes!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nicest youth gloves my son has had so far
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He has difficulty getting them on by himself because the wrist elastic is pretty tight, however when the strap is taught I feel like he gets better wrist protection out of these than other youth gloves. Padding and palm material has held up all season.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to big brands for recreational soccer
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and resistant, I can hardly tell the difference with more expensive options from other top-notch brands... At a ridiculous price.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo G

customer_reviews.title: My grandson love this goalie goalkeeper gloves
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love this goalie goalkeeper gloves. Fit perfectly, amazing quality, fast delivery. Everything is at superlative! Thank you and i'm verry happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These have reasonable grip and good finger support for the price. Durable too, has lasted 2 seasons so far with no noticeable damage...just some dirt accumulation.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian B Becker

customer_reviews.title: Already damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why and how but this gloves got damaged even in the very first game. I thought it is ok but yesterday we had the second game they got worse! Poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Walker

customer_reviews.title: Supper disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My son liked the gloves but after only 10-11 practices the stitching ripped out. I emailed the company about a replacement because it appears to be a defect. I will update this review if I hear from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far- my goalie is super happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my high school team's goalie because his pair had ripped. This pair has already lasted twice as long as the pair that he had previously, and they were the exact same cost. The grippiness is great, too, and the size was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Value. Don't plan on multiple seasons of use
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my U-14 Goalies. They liked the grip and that the finger spines weren't as stiff and were more comfortable than the last set of gloves they used. Biggest complaint was that they were too hot and their hands would sweat greeting the second half goalie with sweaty gloves. Even in 70 degree weather. But they seem to get used to it. Hard to assess durability. My guess is 1 season in mostly dry hot conditions. Not sure how they handle in rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lozaw

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, great value!
customer_reviews.text: First, I have to say gloves look great. They have a really good finger protection and they fit perfectly. The way it feels inside is amazing. They have also a very good grip and you can barely feel the ball when catching it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: For the price - these are good. A bit worried about durability as I have ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price - these are good. A bit worried about durability as I have some fraying already (played < 15 games) BUT didn't expect much for the price point. Without getting expensive, these are definitely the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: SheehyCFC

customer_reviews.title: Solid Fit of Performance/Price
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are pretty darn good. My son is on his 3rd pair, not due to issues with the gloves, just normal wear and tear and he likes them well enough to keep ordering the same ones. Finger splints are just the right rigidity to be supportive without being overly stiff. Minus 1 star on durability due to wrist strap tearing off the glove on one pair (still usable without it).
customer_reviews.author: J B.

customer_reviews.title: Great goalie gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great goalie gloves, they fit my 8/9yo son great and provided quite a bit of protection. They held up well all season, too! Would happily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Porter Fam

customer_reviews.title: Used and incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to contact te selker, I received this stuff used , stinky and without the pritectirs
customer_reviews.author: Marlon aldenys Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing keeper in the backyard with my 14 year old son. He was hurting my hands till I got these!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff
customer_reviews.text: I guess the quality is good but the comfort especially for a child isn't. Unable to make a fist or even attempt to. Very stiff. Size 7 for 9 year old. Tight. Will return
customer_reviews.author: Lats

customer_reviews.title: Runs smaller than chart
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good product and it ws really nice looking. The size ran too small based on the measurement chart they provide. I needed size 10 when the chart showed 9. If they jad size 10s i would definitely reorder it.
customer_reviews.author: t828

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product and we would buy them again. My son like them and he found to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the color and quality of these gloves. We go through a lot of gloves every year because she plays so much and hard. She likes these and never complained.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Trapp

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product! My friend uses them as a gift and says they’re as good as his favorites which cost a lot more. Good quality and good purchase
customer_reviews.author: msides1

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for our teen daughter
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is new to playing goalie and she likes these gloves. We appreciate the extra support of the "spines". The sizing was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great training gloves
customer_reviews.text: The product just arrived. It seems to be very durable and sturdy. It think these will make great training gloves, as opposed to some soft latex pair which would fall apart quite quickly. Also, I think the finger save will be a great help for all the drills.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Fit is Good, Quality is Not
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son bought these gloves for use throughout his summer practices and for the 2018 varsity soccer season. Unfortunately, they have not held up well at all. The wrist stitching has ripped and pulled away from the actual glove portion. Just not a good buy for the price given how fast they ripped and became unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Love the gloves!
customer_reviews.text: The size requested for a nine year-old soccer player was just right. Quality material. Red and white color scheme seemed to be to his liking as well. Recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Rock Maven

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of gloves worth the money not to thick of a glove but my husband plays in indoor soccer and they were perfect for that nothing professional
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Wow gloves look great but used them yesterday for the fisrt time and the gloves already started to fall apart. Actually started while I was warming up. I would like a replacement pair sent to me
customer_reviews.author: michael gallo

customer_reviews.title: BEST GLOVES!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are the best! My son plays competitive club soccer. We used to buy gloves of other brands, unfortunately they very quickly became unusable. I should have bought new ones after 3-4 months. These gloves are made very high quality. Comfortable. Size as expected. We are very pleased with the purchase, we recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Irina Smagina

customer_reviews.title: Finger guards needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays comp soccer and needs gloves with the finger guard. Most gloves get worn out quickly. So far so good with these.
customer_reviews.author: Simplify

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves  for 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old said that these gloves are the most comfortable gloves with a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: David Graham

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t protect well the fingers but for an amateur goalie it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit.
customer_reviews.text: As a golie, I tend to be very picky on gloves and their color and style. I bought these gloves due to the prices and reviews. I've to say these gloves fit really well and I have chubby hands. I recommend this gloves. Next time I'll get the green ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great price but they could have used a slightly more durable material on the grips. However I’ve used it multiples times on grass, turf and mud and they still have good grip. These are very good cheaper gloves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: A bit stiff to use but I assume they will get more comfortable once broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Clara D

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. waste of money. used 2 times and started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best goalie gloves I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best goalie gloves I ever owned. Have used 4 or 5 pairs of Renault gloves but these have lasted much longer. They fit better (wrist is not too tight) and they have finger spines.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: it bad
customer_reviews.text: it nice when you receive it but its easy to broken (finger saver and the gloves) one or two match and you will throw it. choice another brand .
customer_reviews.author: Ourfan

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great so far had to buy as a quick replacement for a pair of bigger name brand gloves that started to fall apart after one practice. These have survived almost a month of multiple practices and games a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old used it for one session as a goalie and the foam palm started to disintegrate. We returned it and will plan to buy some from the local Scheels.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Fang

customer_reviews.title: Thin gloves, little padding, but low price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. At this very low price you get very thin gloves with very little padding. Gloves are hard to bend as the exterior is very tough - a good thing - but there isn't much to this glove so it isn't that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Donnelly

product_meta.title: Youth&Adult Goalie Goalkeeper Gloves,Strong Grip for The Toughest Saves, with Finger Spines to Give Splendid Protection to Prevent Injuries,3 Colors
feature_bullets: FOR THE TOUGHEST SAVES：- These goalkeeper gloves have the wear-resistant latex palms which can give you the extremely strong control and grip when handling the ball. Meanwhile, the unique positive cut design gives you the best ball-contact for the toughest saves in play.

FINGER AND PALM PROTECTION：- The new improved BACKBONE finger save system of these goalie gloves helps you protect the Hyper-Extended finger injuries which frequently occur in competition or training and the extremely thick padded latex foam can offer more cushioning protections to your palm.

DURABLE & COMFORTABLE：- Being made from high quality composite materials of EVA and latex, these gloves are so strong that they are hard to splitted whether in fierce competition or in routine training. In addition, the gloves are lightweight and very comfortable.

APPLICATION & AFTER SALE SERVICE：- These perfect goalkeeper gloves are suitable for the people from junior trainees to high school, all the way to adult soccer whether in training or match play. If there is any problem with the product, please don't hesitate to contact us.
